The planters were not desirous
of becoming dealers in stocks and speculators in dividends ■
but they wished to have a road completed, and that right
speedily; and to this end all, within the circle of his

Eventually the resolution was adopted, with an amendment, allowing fifty members for the Parish of Orleans.
The President then said that he would to-morrow
announce the names of the members of the Committee
to draft the Address and Memorials.
On motion, the Convention adjourned until the next day,
at 10 o'clock, a. m.
SECOND DAY.
Saturday, January 3, 1852.
The Convention met, and was called to order at 11
o'clock, the President in the chair.
ihe minutes of yesterday's session having been read
